title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 580.6 - Inoperative vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 580.6 - Inoperative vehicles

State Regulations
(a) If a
vehicle becomes inoperative for any reason and it is parked in violation of
this Part, it is the responsibility of the student who owns or is in control of
the vehicle to make immediate arrangements to remove it. Vehicle breakdowns may
not be accepted as an excuse for being illegally parked. (b) Storage of inoperative or damaged
vehicles or those not displaying registration plates in campus parking lots is
prohibited, except as specifically permitted by the administration. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
580.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
